name: Montblanc - Motorcycle tablet concept design
description:
To keep on the Montblanc project I made a tablet concept design. I have placed all the important elements and also added horizontally scrolling blocks with the characteristics of the motorcycle.


Big thanks for this awesome motorcycle design to Huigyu Kim.


What's inside :

- Tablet Motorcycle Product Page

- Characteristics Block


I am always available for new projects!
